prompt: How do I run better user interviews this week?
seedResponse: Start with one clear research objective and one target participant profile.

prompt: Best way to position and launch this product for pipeline growth?
seedResponse: Pick one ICP segment and one promise before testing channels.

prompt: Where do I start to validate onboarding friction?
seedResponse: Capture the top 3 drop-off moments and test one hypothesis at a time.

prompt: Teach me the best way to tighten messaging before launch
seedResponse: Rewrite the headline using exact buyer pain language and one proof point.

prompt: How do I decide what to test first?
